s: Wind, branches, bashing into trees, and all other sorts of other roughness occurs on are hikes and I've never had an issue with this umbrella. My hiking friend seemed to be buying several umbrellas a year so i convinced him to get a gustbuster. He's had it ever since and it still looks brand new.
